mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_catg_code, title, cont, dsply_chk, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) values (#{faq_catg_code}, #{title}, #{cont}, #{dsply_chk}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{reg_id})
mapper.sql: select faq_seq, faq_catg_code, title, cont, dsply_chk, view_cnt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id from faq
mapper.select: order by f.faq_seq ASC, f.reg_date DESC
where dsply_chk = 'Y' order by f.faq_seq ASC, f.reg_date DESC
mapper.sql: select f.faq_seq, f.faq_catg_code, f.title, f.cont, f.dsply_chk, f.view_cnt, f.reg_date, f.reg_id, f.up_date, f.up_id, (select name from faq_cate c where f.faq_catg_code = c.cate_code) catg_name from faq f
mapper.select:
where f.dsply_chk = 'Y'
and (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or cont like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
and title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by f.faq_seq ASC, f.reg_date DESC
where f.dsply_chk = 'Y' and f.faq_catg_code like concat(#{faq_catg_code}, '%') order by f.faq_seq ASC, f.reg_date DESC
